home.title: Wellcome to {name}
home.friends: The best app to know your friends oppinion about everything you need.

polls.create-message: You only need to create a {new-poll} and share it with your friends.
polls.types-message: There are many {types}, from the simple {registration} to the more complex.

home.edit: Everybody now can participate and give their opinion following the link.

no-login.message: By default, {everyone}, allowing create or answer polls quickly, but these are {related}.
no-login.for-everyone: everyone can access PollMe without login
no-login.device-related: only related to the device used

login.message: If you {create} a PollMe account, you will be able to access your polls and answers {device} you {login}.

fill.author: by {author-name}
fill.remove-vote-confirm: The vote from {name} will be removed from the poll.

no-login.message: REMEMBER, if you do not {login} all the activity will only be accessible from the device used.

polls.delete-poll-confirm: The poll {name} and all his answers will be deleted and will not be accessible anymore.

no-polls.title: You have no polls yet!!
no-polls.description: Do not worry, you can create the first clicking the button below

new.title: New poll
new.first-select-type: First, select what kind of poll you want to create

form.description-placeholder: Tell about what to participate in

1.name: Registration
1.description: Take a quick look at who is going to participate in the topic you describe.

2.name: Yes / No
2.description: Ask the people for their opinion or participation in whatever.

3.name: Selection
3.description: List of two or more options from which people can choose.

not-found.title: This is not the poll you are looking for...
not-found.description: The poll with key '{key}' does not exist, maybe it is expired or has been deleted by the author.

email.label: Email
email.exists-error: This email does not match any registered user.

password.label: Password
password.min-length-error: The password should have at least {length} characters.

register.info: With a PollMe account, you can access your polls from any device, have a profile and much more features that require a valid user.

name.label: Display name
name.length-error: The name should have {min} to {max} characters.

profile.min-length-error: The field should have at least {min} characters.
profile.file-error: The image can not has a size over {size}

new-password.label: New
new-password.not-same-as-current-error: The new password can not be the same as current.

confirm-password.label: Confirm
confirm-password.same-as-new-error: Must equal to the new password.

not-found.title: Page not found
not-found.info: But keep calm, you still can go to:

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: Something in the app went wrong for some reason
error.info: Keep calm and take a look at this possible solutions:

project-details.message: PollMe is an {project-link} made with {love-icon} by {community-link} under the {license-link}

contribution.message: You can contribute by coding or propose new features {issues-link}
